name: tinify
description: Node.js client for the Tinify API. Tinify compresses your images intelligently. Read more at https://tinify.com.
author: Rolf Timmermans <rolftimmermans@voormedia.com>

scripts.test: rm -rf lib/**.{js,ts} && tsc && tsc --noEmit test/tinify-typing-test.ts && mocha --reporter dot test/*-test.js
scripts.integration: rm -rf lib/**.{js,ts} && tsc && mocha --reporter dot test/integration.js
